title: Organic_CPU Copilot Input
description: Normalized bio-feedback metrics for a chat-based AI orchestrator. All semantic constraints (e.g., 0.0â€“1.0 ranges) must be enforced by the application layer.

bio_summary.description: Summary of the user's current physiological, cognitive, and eco state.

fatigue_index.description: Normalized fatigue index (0.0 = rested, 1.0 = maximal fatigue).

duty_cycle.description: Normalized duty cycle of device interaction (0.0 = idle, 1.0 = maximal continuous use).

cognitive_load_index.description: Normalized cognitive load index (0.0 = low load, 1.0 = overwhelmed).

intent_confidence.description: Confidence in the interpreted user intent (0.0 = uncertain, 1.0 = certain).

eco_impact_score.description: Normalized environmental impact score for the session (lower is better).

device_hours.description: Total hours the device has been in use during the current session.
